sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Bar id="my-chart-id" :options="chartOptions" :data="chartData" />
</template>

<script>
import { Bar } from "vue-chartjs";
import {
  Chart as ChartJS,
  Title,
  Tooltip,
  Legend,
  BarElement,
  CategoryScale,
  LinearScale,
} from "chart.js";

ChartJS.register(
  Title,
  Tooltip,
  Legend,
  BarElement,
  CategoryScale,
  LinearScale
);

export default {
  name: "BarChart",
  components: { Bar },
  data() {
    return {
      chartData: {
        labels: [
          "January",
          "February",
          "March",
          "April",
          "May",
          "June",
          "July",
        ],
        datasets: [
          {
            label: "January",
            data: [10, 15, 30],
            backgroundColor: "#F6F1F1",
          },
          {
            label: "Dataset 2",
            data: [15, 20, 40],
            backgroundColor: "#19A7CE",
          },
          {
            label: "Dataset 3",
            data: [20, 25, 45],
            backgroundColor: "#146C94",
          },
          {
            label: "Dataset 4",
            data: [10, 15, 30],
            backgroundColor: "#F6F1F1",
          },
          {
            label: "Dataset 2",
            data: [15, 20, 40],
            backgroundColor: "#19A7CE",
          },
          {
            label: "June",
            data: [20, 25, 45],
            backgroundColor: "#146C94",
          },
          {
            label: "Dataset 2",
            data: [15, 20, 40],
            backgroundColor: "#19A7CE",
          },
        ],
      },
      chartOptions: {
        responsive: true,
        type: "barStacked",
        stacked: true,
        grouped: false,
        scales: {
          x: {
            //position: "top",
          },
        },
      },
    };
  },
};
</script>
